org.onehippo.forge.content.pojo.binder.jcr

Class DefaultJcrContentNodeBinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.onehippo.forge.content.pojo.binder.jcr.DefaultJcrContentNodeBinder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ContentNodeBinder<javax.jcr.Node,ContentItem,javax.jcr.Value>

    public class DefaultJcrContentNodeBinder
extends Object
implements ContentNodeBinder<javax.jcr.Node,ContentItem,javax.jcr.Value>
    Default ContentNodeBinder implementation for JCR.

    • Method Detail

      • isSubNodesMergingOnly

        public boolean isSubNodesMergingOnly()
        Return true if it should merge subnodes without removing any other existing subnodes.

        The default value is false, meaning the default behavior is to remove all the existing subnodes beforehand and add all the subnodes from the ContentNode afterward, resulting any other subnodes that do not exist in the input ContentNode to be removed by default.

        Returns:
        true if it should merge subnodes without removing any other existing subnodes

      • setSubNodesMergingOnly

        public void setSubNodesMergingOnly(boolean subNodesMergingOnly)
        Set flag whether it should merge subnodes without removing any other existing subnodes.
        Parameters:
        subNodesMergingOnly -
